name: DailyUI's 30 Day Challenge: My Journey
description:
Hi there, my name is Nancy. I tried the 30 day challenge from DailyUI!


To be more specific, there are actually 32 days worth of prompts. Each day has its corresponding page. Inside each page, I have the prompt written, as well as notes I made, and of course the final product!


Disclaimer: I was totally new to UI/UX when I first started! Since completing this, I have expanded my view a little bit more. I began to look into LinkedIn courses, and started some side projects. This DailyUI challenge was a great starting-off point for me personally, but it may not be a good one for all. I gave myself a bit of time everyday to work on this while going through my Fall semester at university.


I love that this challenge made me challenge myself in the visual aspect. I am excited to start diving into the UX world on how to better user experiences!
